content: charleston belt is a perfect crochet accessory to complement any outfit from jeans and shirt to a little black dress it is constructed from a square flower motif in the middle with the chevron straps going either side finished with a 3 string fastening the belt has been designed for sizes xs - 5 xl sizes 58 cm - 127 cm waist circumference but includes notes on size adjustments i used cygnet cottony dk but any cotton or cotton blend would be suitable for this project you will need 2-3 skeins of yarn for this project
